snippet.title: Live Coding: Web templating w/ Bootstrap CSS in Django
snippet.description:
Today I will build a simple front end template for the Django example site we've been working on in the previous streams. The front end will be built using Bootstrap CSS and the backend will be implemented with Django. We will make a few templates that suit common use cases like a landing page, main navigation, mobile responsiveness, and data listing pages.
https://github.com/DevDungeon/DjangoAuthExample 


GitHub: https://www.github.com/DevDungeon
